website_summaries.verdict: The Razer Kraken Ultimate wired gaming headset brings powerful bass, programmable lighting, and an excellent microphone to your PC.
pros: Loud, full sound with THX Spatial Audio

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for small heads!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have a tiny head so buying a headset was a stressful experience. My old headset used to ache after a while as they’d press my glasses against my ears or squash my piercings. However, these have completely removed this problem from gaming for me. The extendable mic is also a nice touch as it means you can move it away from your face when you’re not in a party. The comfort and sound quality are both high quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort
customer_reviews.text: You all know razer offers great quality. And as always, with this headset they did too. Very durable metal frame and the most comfortable cushions I have tried. Very stealthy all black look, it doesnt scream that its razer like their other products. The software is very pretty and intuitive, however the thx spatial audio is a little bit worse than you'd expect. Some other 7.1 surrounds I've tried worked better but the comfort is just heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I hated this headset so much, First of all its really uncomfortable after an hour of wearing it, it was causing me to have breakouts in my skin around my ears and my neck maybe an allergic reaction to the horrible material on the ear cuffs, The mic is crap everyone was complaining about how quiet i am so i had to turn everything up full. the mic has to be basically in your mouth to pic up sound its the worst headset i've owned. which is sad because every other Razer product ive owned has been great. I have recently replaced this headset with the HyperX cloud II which are amazing and well worth spending the extra money on.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyL

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed - Sadly
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to give negative reviews, but after installing the software, I then spent 30 minutes trying to get the Synapse (EQ etc) Software working. Eventually it started to work, however, compared to the HyperX Cloud I had replaced, the audio was hollow, distant, and very unnatural sounding to me. Maybe it was just me, but I thought the sound quality was likened to the audio was being thrown at me from a distant room. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: stephen potts

customer_reviews.title: There is much better out there for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set of these because of the reviews but ,wish I had not .the advert stated surround sound 7.1 all you have to do is download the app ,this doesn’t work as I had bought these for a console as the advert states ,but console does not support the file you need to download and the buzzing noise you get is insane when you plug them in ,downloaded an app to see if the surround sound would work but it doesn’t .stay well clear of these . You can not even register them for the warranty as each time you enter the serial number and product number it says invalid
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Build quality on point & Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable and the sound is good. The microphone is very clear but a bit too quiet. I just rated the "Noise cancellation" category at 3 because it blocks some "noise" but it can be definitely improvised. The headphones gave me comfort during long hours of playing games. I just bought them because of a friend recommendation and I don't regret it. The overall rating is 4 stars because the cable gets tangled too often and is quite annoying but it might be only me, I have seen some reviews that they don't have problems with tangling at all.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Don'y buy not worth
customer_reviews.text: Where do i start.. Mic straight up doesn't work. As soon as i plugged it in it started installing synapse, very faulty trash software took several restarts to work and after it finally did the headphones literally dont even show up as available devices. Sound quality wise its a big letdown from the kraken chroma 7.1 i previously and currently have to use but thats somewhat expected without the proper settings from the software. Worked fine on my phone but thats not what i bought them for. Comfort wise its fine but it doesnt add up for all the problems. Overall just avoid i'd say just buy the kraken v2 pro maybe or the chroma 7.1
customer_reviews.author: speedomike

customer_reviews.title: white, Razer Kraken X headphones, for gaming/music ect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, wow the sound is amazing! after having problems with another set I purchased about being surround sound, these white headphones not only look great they do have surround sound, noise cancelling, they are 100% worth the money paid, i was about to cancel my order after the first pair were a disappointment, but so glad i kept them now, absolutely recommend these, superb, adjustable , really comfy around the top of the head and cushioned leather ear covers/pads. 8 pounds cheaper than the first set i bought and prefer these alot.my son had the black set and my other son had the white, love,love love them
customer_reviews.author: Miss clarke

customer_reviews.title: Sound is incredible, but the comfort even more so!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my £20.00 headset from game which unfortunately wasn't compatible with my desktop PC without issue. Extremely comfortable and the sound is brilliant. Took around 15-20 minutes to adjust all the sound settings on Windows, followed by installation of the software and configuration of everything but once it's set up, works brilliant on my PC with surround sound and is easy enough to switch to my PS4 when using that. The USB hub makes it easy to control the computer volume/bass/game chat/game volume, and then when you wish to use on a different device with a 3.5mm jack, it's a case of simply unplugging fgrom the HUB and into the other device.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Aitken

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Not the best pair of headset on the market, of course, but actually I have way more expensive headsets like the Sony WH-1000XM3, and don't notice an extreme change when changing to this. Actually the passive noise cancellation is acceptable, when playing music/games I can't barely hear environmental noise. Regarding the sound quality, is not as sharp as other headsets, but nothing (treble/mid/bass) is overcompensated, maybe the mids a little bit muddy but nothing too bad. The microphone is really good for its purpose, my friends hear me way better than using previous mics. Is not an studio quality mic, but if you just need your voice to sound clear, this mic is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Had to return, good sound, bad mic.
customer_reviews.text: I've had to return as they didnt do what i wanted. 1. Didnt fit my little head, there was abit of a gap even on the smallest setting. 2. Mic was too quiet, even when i fiddled with all the settings quility was poor and was really quiet. 3. Sound was the only thing that was okay on these things, but I had issues setting them up as there is a separate driver and I already have enough sound issues with my laptop (realtek audio such a pain) I needed them for gaming and work, and the mic quality was not good enough for either. I'm now looking at some turtle bay ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tat

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Worst headset with horrendous out of the box sound.. would never buy razer headset again. Not recommended and felt very cheap quality..
customer_reviews.author: cJ

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for the price period.
customer_reviews.text: I am what you would call an audiophile... I have at my disposal: Astro a40 Beats studio 3 Vmoda crossfade LP2 sony wh-1000xm3 And many other popular headphones I have used for gaming! Out of all the above I can honestly say these take the win for both accurate soundstage and comfort when gaming. The software is great, and you can even mount the remote next to your desk for easy access. You won't get better performance for this price range, and they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Kraken is great set for Xbox Players
customer_reviews.text: Great set for Xbox since Microsoft being weird about wireless connectivity. Prefer the Kraken to Kraken X, since they are bigger and more comfortable. Fit perfectly around ears with/without glasses on. The Kraken have 50mm drivers compared to Kraken X, thus the sound capability is better. The 7.1 surround on the Kraken X is gimmick since you can set your audio settings through console or PC and it will give you the surround sound you need. Most games in the last 10 years give you the ability to set audio settings. One more thing. They are cheaper on the Microsoft store and actually get delivered unlike my experience here on prime. The package still says rescheduled for delivery....
customer_reviews.author: Mahan Arora

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but not so much for Xbox...
customer_reviews.text: All in all, a very good headset. It feels good quality, looks well made and has very easy to follow instructions. I would advise against getting these if you intend to use them for the xbox though - you can't use the USB audio box connection at all as the way the xbox uses it's ports prevents you from running any audio signal through them so you're stuck with just the 3.5mm jack connection. This would be fine normally but you can't use all the functions or potential of the headphones without connecting the audio control box. Perfect for Playstation users and PC though!
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Menzies

customer_reviews.title: Great surround sound but don't forget to get the software!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the new Razer Kraken (Mercury edition) to replace a 6 year old Razer headset. The headset is really comfortable as the ear pads are quite large, so they don't quite rest ON your ears but AROUND them. I also wear glasses and they don't dig in. NOTE: these are surround sound headphones that require extra software from the Razer website! Before you get it, the sound quality will seem poor! My only complaint in the end is that the noise cancellation is pretty bad - I can still hear plenty from outside the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones that could commandeer a higher price and still be good value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones after having a generic gaming headset for a couple years... I really wish I had gotten these sooner. The sound is awesome, deep base, crisp vocals and everything in-between. The ear pads are soft to wear and block out background noise really well. My friends on discord say my mic sounds a lot better too. The synthesized 7.1 surround is great in games too, made playing destiny 2 a whole lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A bit too good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother. He wanted a cheaper headset so I decided to get him a free upgrade for his birthday (admittedly, a pair I wanted to try). I think I've now created an issue for the rest of my family, as he now can't hear anyone when they call him. I've definitely got him into more trouble than he used to get into. Can't complain, although family definitely will!
customer_reviews.author: Sabir Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and comfortable for hours of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for gaming but also since working from home, I’m on a lot of calls so I wanted something comfy for hours of use both work and play. These are comfortable, a little more loose on the ears than I’m used to but this is likely a contributor to comfort. Cranked up the music volume today and they sound great, I usually use my wireless Beats for music but was happy to keep these on. Although Slack or Zoom apps didn’t pick up the headphone jack unless I used the apps on chrome which is weird so I’ve ordered a USB adapter because I’ve literally tried everything else. Great head set, deffo recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ElfySmenelfy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair of these at full price last September for my son. Last week they stopped working. Tried plugging them into different things but wouldn’t work. Called Amazon, a new pair arrived the next day and I sent the others ones back at the PO a couple of days later. Can’t fault Amazon. The headphones were the best my son has ever used (in his opinion) he says the sound was great and trust me, he can not hear a thing when he is wearing them. I noticed they have now been reduced at a really good price. Even though ours broke they are a great price, great sound and are covered by Amazon. Can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are negative reviews on this. Simply put, this is a BUDGET gaming headset that offers 7.1 surround (which actually works), that's extremely comfortable for long gaming hours, and that gives you mic and volume control. Sound quality cannot be compared to high end products, but they're at least double or triple the price. It's made of plastic, but is extremely light and covers the ears in full making it all the more comfortable. Would highly recommend knowing that you're buying a higher end BUDGET headset. Last advice: avoid the cheap Chinese headsets on amazon, they look nice and work well at first, but don't last long and aren't as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hazem

customer_reviews.title: Great Gamer headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great Gamer headphones. The good. 1. great price. 2. Super comfortable for extended use. 3. Really good sound, clear and detail in sound range. 4. look ok. 5. nice length of cable connect easy. 6. Perfect for gaming. 7. Microphone well placed and works well. the not so good. 1. Not the loudest headphones, (but loud enough) 2. If you wear glasses like I do, the cup goes over these pressing them in your head, I wear these for 1 1/2 hours and I have had enough for a while. still I got use too this. I still think these are great headphones. overall I would say 9.5/10
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the original price...
customer_reviews.text: The headset seems to keep making a loud clicking noise when skimming through audio and stuff, the "THX Spatial sound" Is okay for some games but isn't ideal for music, videos, or movies as it seems to make the treble and bass sound off. Overall the build quality is very premium and it feels rigid and sturdy however if you have a large head you will find the headset somewhat uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time. The Razer Synapse software seems somewhat clunky however the Alexa integration is a nice bonus for those who have home automation.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Audio sounds very poor for headphone of this price. They have no weight and audio sounds tinny. The volume controls are backwards, as in you have to rotate it to get access to mute. the volume wheel also has very little rotation, so you cant control the volume easy. The cable feels cheap. Might be good for gaming but music and general use I would avoid. There is no bass to speak of.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'd be surprised if you can find better gaming headsets at this price. I like that they're just all black and don't have horrible styling like some do where they are bright blue or green. They're not as comfortable as I'd hope but I've worn them for three hour sessions without any real issues. The mic retracting is one of the mean reasons I got this. Excellent feature. No complaints about my mic quality so I'm sure it's fine. Sound quality is good but not great. You can't beat normal headphones at the same price for sound quality so if you want headphones for gaming but don't need a mic then just use decent headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Slip off your head and audio quality is inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a semi replacement to my turtle beach. I wish I hadn't. The audio quality was poor and they slide about on your head as you move as the ear cups are so large. As an adult male this shouldn't happen. They only upside is they look nice, but this is worthless when they don't function properly. I've sent them back and bought the Turtle Beach 70N instead. Much better - id recommend these instead as none of the above problems present themselves. They are also cheaper at £25 as of writing this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Macintyre

customer_reviews.title: NOT fully compatible for XBOX ONE
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons birthday as they had really good reviews, and it states they can be used with the XBOX One, it had this clearly in the description text, and clearly on the front of the box. In actual fact the you cannot use the THX USB audio controller that comes with them, you can only plug them into the normal headphone jack on the XBOX controller and their is a cheap mini inline audio control for volume and mic switch so you end up getting standard sound through an oversized pair of headphones, the small print in the technical specification actually splits the functionality maybe you should list that in the item description?
customer_reviews.author: Capt666

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased these just for gaming, and they were fantastic. Nice and comfy even after wearing for hours. Then with the pandemic they became my daily headphones to work from home, and they have been a god send. I use these for 8 hours plus and they serve me well. Still comfy after all this use. Only note is that with such excessive use the lovely grey ear cups have gone a bit off coloured and aren't cleaning up too well as they are a suedeish material. Still excellent headphones tho
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Really liking this a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset. It feels cool on the ears even with hours of use, it’s comfortable and it’s the only headphones that do not hurt me when I wear glasses! At first I was using another brand’s headphones but as I got glasses in the meantime, it was hurting me too much... I switched to those and I’m loving it! Sound is decent... the mic could be better but it’s good enough to call on Discord and play with friends online. The mic also works with the simple jack on iPhone, that’s pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily to play World of Warcraft online so I can listen and talk to other players. The sound quality is excellent, it makes the whole game richer, with immersive surround sound and the music sounds great! Very good at blocking ambient sounds from around me too, no-one can speak to me when I'm wearing them, even when there's no sound coming through the headphones ;) Really good quality especially for the price, I would recommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for £50
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my Sennheiser HD201 headphones, the Krakens are really bad value. The sound quality on those £25 headphones were brilliant. However, the Krakens are still good, but not good enough for more than twice the RRP. The microphone quality is good, style is good and the build quality is brilliant. However, there is an issue with the in-line volume control where low volume settings cause the right ear to be quieter than the left. This is not an issue when the slider is about 20% or more. Additionally, the hardware microphone mute switch is good and does not leak any sound or cause any static.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Roper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall package with the minimalist design, high-quality sound, comfortable ear cups for hours and even days worth of gaming also has a very clear microphone with great accessibility one thing to note is that the 7.1 surround sound is not compatible on any console and can only run on Windows 10 so if you want surround sound on a mac or whilst playing PS, Xbox or Nintendo that won't be possible but the drivers create such amazing sound and the bass hits you like a truck. Would buy again if my current ones broke.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: USB version
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feeling on these, if your pc overheats, it’s causes sound crackling, or if dust in the port. I often have to change ports to fix the crackling. The noise cancellation is awful. I can still hear the tv while wearing these. These also cause issues with my sound settings, I often have to disable other outlets in order for the mic or speakers to work. Very comfortable to wear and great sound quality. Too many issues to give it positive review
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Requires apps and Razer Account
customer_reviews.text: To get full impact and total gaming joy you need to download the Razer surround sound app along with the Razer synapse app. Enter the code that's in the box to activate. You have to create a free account It's not amazing surround sound but it is quite brilliant how the software widens the sound field. For gaming it's actually very good.
customer_reviews.author: LSTni

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At this price point there are many options for head phones. I choose these for home office use. They are light weight and comfortable to wear for hours. The mic boom is flexible and easy to shape. Voice quality is great. Mute button is useful and easy to access I can wear these without pulling out the extensions on the head band, so they may be little bit of a larger than average size. Only down side compared to premium head phones is that the cable is moulded into the headphones and is not detachable. Overall I would recommend these and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: jack reacher

customer_reviews.title: TAKES A LOT OF TIME TO GET WORKING BUT PRETTY GOOD ONCE IT IS
customer_reviews.text: It took me nearly an hour to get these headphones and mic working. Due to them not being USB they don't just work when you plug them in and you need to download drivers and change settings on your machine. You also need to download the 5.1 Surround Sound drivers from Razer, and even then you might not be able to work out exactly whether they're working or not! If you're confident with making adjustments and changing registry files on your computer then you'll probably be ok, but if you just want something that works out of the box then I'd recommend not buying these.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit.
customer_reviews.text: Pros. USB adapter is very useful. Cooling gell feels nice. Good sound quality. Good mic quality. Comfy. Mute and volume controls on both the headset wire and the usb adapter. Cons. Loose fit. Had to install some software to get good sound through PC. Audio Bleed out because've the loose fit. They're good for me and what I need them for but theyre definitely not for pea heads. Fat head only lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rayman167

customer_reviews.title: Super Amazing Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: An Amazing Product by RAZER THE Sound Quality is amazing. I can hear my enemies foot steps more clearly from a good distance and the bass is pretty good and the microphone on it is amazing too. My voice can be hear more crisp and clear on the other end by my friends Also the colours can be changed depending on you by using the RAZER software Would definitely recommend it to everyone especially to people who loves cute things as the kitten ear makes the headset very attractive and unique
customer_reviews.author: Heman Gurung

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, even when wearing glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones so much!! I am a glasses wearer and can game for long periods of time so headphones can get really unfomfortable after a while. But not these!! The ear pads are genuinely cooling and super comfortable for long periods of time, even when wearing my glasses. The noise cancellation on them is really good too as is the microphone. I also love how the microphone can be tucked away and the small mute and volume controls it has. The fact that yiu can also add ears to them is a bonus!! My boyfriend got the Kraken X Lite pair and is insanely jealous because mine are more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones..been using ps4 phones and decided to get a new pair..these came out best for Sept 2020..and I'm glad I took the time to see what is good out there...brilliant for the money..just want earphones with no gimmicks..I found them!! The sound from these are better than anything I have ever used..footsteps, noises in the background of the game completely surround you...love 'em happy happy game!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easily wear for hours without any discomfort. Retractable mic is great, can hide it back in the can if not being used. The wire is quite long, which is handy as between rounds or short breaks you can walk with your controller and wear the headset. Sound quality is good for gaming, I play for online fps and you can really get a sense of where the opponent is. For the price I'd highly recommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: incredible 360 degree sound
customer_reviews.text: first off, the headset is so comfy and after a while you forget you are wearing them. the ability to adjust the base is also very handy when flipping between games/streams/youtube. when playing games like call of duty or fortnite,you can literally hear which direction gunshots and other players are coming from. this can be a huge advantage. the overall quality of the build of this headset is excellent and the etractable mic is a nice feature. this is the best headset i have ever owened in 15-20 years of gaming. would recommend and would buy again in future.
customer_reviews.author: MONKeEeY

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IF YOURE USING FOR CONSOLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it’s good if you have a pc. But terrible with anything else. Your mic quality is set to the lowest of the low, which can only be changed if you’re using a pc. Otherwise your mates have to listen to you sounding like you’re phoning from a Nokia brick. The sound quality from my turtle beach to these was strange too, these sounded were different and was very weird to play with. Overall very unhappy with these because they were supposed to work with everything. Don’t advertise that if they specifically work with pc. DO NO BUY! Unless using for pc.
customer_reviews.author: Calum Gregson

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty decent, the bass boost is nice. I use these for media consumption, gaming, listening to music and content creation and they do a decent job. The software for enabling 7.1 THX Spatial Audio crashed my machine several times and forced me to have to load in recovery mode to uninstall it, so that was a bit of a nightmare. Also it's been about 3 weeks and as you can see from the picture the cable has started fraying which is annoying. It does fit comfortable, especially on my larger than average sized head which can often be the death of headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Lot of gimmicks without value
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why even tried this one. May be I expected a lot from the brand name. Things are made over complicated unnecessarily. The whole spatial sound is a gimmick i couldn't buy into. It needs separate device to be attached to an already lengthy cable and it doesn't sound good at all. None of the additional features add any value to the experience. I even think they make it worse. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Classy Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the green ones for my 13 year old grandsons birthday. He's over the moon with them. Said they are the best ones he's had and they do everything they state. I have since purchased another pair of white ones for my 23 year old grandsons birthday next week.Hopefully he will be as pleased which i have no doubt about. My other 14 year old grandson wants them too for his birthday at the end of the month !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mrs.k

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good gaming headset or just headset in general don’t know how people can give it less than 5 stars. If it breaks or goes faulty just give it back and get a new one. I got this on the Black Friday sales so it was only £50 for me, but it’s brill. I also have the ears attached aha
customer_reviews.author: Somaiyahk

customer_reviews.title: Only half a review
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is using them for gaming, social media and tv. Things tend to get tested to destruction in this house, parents will understand. These are standing up to the test of time and according to my son, they are far better in terms of quality, comfort and sound than a much more expensive pair he had previously. I am very pleased with them and happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great headset 😊
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this headset. They fit very comfortably on your head (I don’t have any problems being a glasses wearer, they don’t hurt while wearing glasses like most headsets) I use this headset everyday for work as I am an online teacher, the headphones are very clear and the mic is very good also, the only bad thing I would say is the mic isn’t noise cancelling as I can still hear background noise in my playbacks. I haven’t used this headset for gaming yet but I plan too. The headset is very reliable and it’s not very heavy on your head so it doesn’t hurt after wearing it for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pink headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are obviously really pretty. They are slightly big so if I were to lean my head down they start to slide off but I’m always looking at my screen so it’s not a major problem. The ability to toggle when the surround sound can be turned on is great as for video games I don’t like it on but I love it for when I listen to music. Mine came with the slightest mark on one of the ear pads but apart from that the packaging and product arrived in perfect condition! They look amazing with my setup and you don’t see the inside of the ear pad so overall they look and work great:)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headset with surround sound
customer_reviews.text: The name multipurpose is definitely attributable to this headset. With clear sound whether used for games or online meetings (#Teams & #Zoom). They also come with a nice plus which is 7.1 surround sound software that can be downloaded and is mindblowing at first try. The headphones are comfortable after stretching them out a bit to fit one's big head. microphone is soft wire so can be bent to comfortable positions. Wire is of suitable length as well of more than 1 meter. The ear cups don't heat up too much and it is quite light on the ears (more than my last ones which I could only wear for 15 mins at a time).
customer_reviews.author: Karim

customer_reviews.title: Great, no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Great, no issues whatsoever. I didn't realise how soundproof they were until I took them off and realise I had been so loud (as I couldn't hear myself haha), but once you realise you adjust. Mic is good, used for gaming with girlfriend or friends.Sound quality is decent, no issues. Perhaps not quite as crisp as more expensive ones I had in past, but for the price I would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset!
customer_reviews.text: After initially finding it hard to set these up. You have to install multiple razor apps and drivers but this headset is amazing! My twitch followers bought them for me! They can be customised to flash certain patterns etc when when people follow or sub or donate or even type certain stuff in chat! They are amazing. Really comfy and perfect. Love them. 100% recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: gloria wright

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable quality Headset
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable headset! I didn't think I would need the cooling ear pads but they really do help after wearing the headset for some time. Comes with jack splitter which works better for my laptop. The sound quality is good and the sound cancelling is very effective, I usually have to take the headset off to hear around me. I use a razer gaming mouse and have had a good experience with their products. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sakura K.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Had to send this Razer Kraken gaming headset back because died in the space of 2-3 weeks and produced no sound at all despite the lights turning on the THX control, was not impressed at all. The sound quality was not great either so definitely with not be getting another Razer headset in the future. No what I expect from Razer.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got them for her indoors for her long chats with her friends , she loves them good sound ect ect. My only problem with them is because of the open back I can still hear her friends screeching though them .....and I WISH that they had a setting that not only taught her but could lower her VOICE ........... may be some socks ...... got to go she talking to her friends again .......
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sindall

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! Took the chance on something a little bit expensive for myself, but well worth it. Especially with all the gaming that’s going on with lockdown!
customer_reviews.author: Abi Penny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset, great all rounder
customer_reviews.text: As with every Razer product the headset is amazing. Sound quality is fantastic and I can’t hear anything else with the headset on! Including my fiancé talking to his online friends when he’s sitting next to me! I love the light up chroma kitty ears they’re super cute! All in all a brilliant headset that I can’t find fault with.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Headphones are great, mic not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The actual headphones for this product sound great, probably the best I've heard on a headset and maybe the best I've heard in general (I usually buy cheap headphones). The mic, however, is a bit of a pain. Apparently it sounds fine on Discord however I the mic test feature doesn't pick up my voice at all so I have to take my friends' word for it. Also, don't use this for recording as the white noise is extremely noticeable. I also found that the in-game voice chat doesn't recognise my voice with the mic. I will be keeping these for the headphone quality, but I will be purchasing a separate mic to use for calls and game chats.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Luckins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a pair of Razer Kraken 7.1 Croma (first version) and they sounded better than the Razer Kraken Tournament Edition. The sound is by no respects bad on the TE, it's just slightly worse than on my previous headset. I believe the 7.1 surround sound is just better than the THX. Other than that the headset is much better in durability, comfort and mic quality. But if I'm spending £70, I want an upgrade in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've had gaming headsets that were a lot more money and they were better but for the price this isn't bad, easy to hear where footsteps and gun shots are coming from. These aren't super loud, I can comfortably listen through these on maximum and the sound is still clear with decent base but not too powerful. I think you can do much worse for £50.
customer_reviews.author: J N.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: ive owned a kraken headset before and that one worked fine,razor was a brand i supported and trusted but this purchase was defect as hell. the mic made me unhearable despite me nearly swallowing the dam thing,and the sound itself is below standard at best and has now given up on me after only 2/3 months after purchase. wont be buying another razor headset again after this,id recommend trying a different headset or brand altogether
customer_reviews.author: Stormcrow

customer_reviews.title: Look really cute, but mediocre sound and hardware issues.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fine but not what you'd expect for the amount of money these cost (ex. I have similarly priced bluetooth headphones that are better in any regard minus aesthetics). The mic quality is alright too, not as good as a dedicated but it works. The main issue is that after a couple of months worth of use I semi frequently get a 'USB device has stopped working due to a malfunction' message on my computer followed by loss of audio, sometimes static in the left can, and the headphones being disconnected from Razer Synapse so the lighting resets. This is really annoying so I'm not using them anymore but they look cute so I'm not returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Hard eh.
customer_reviews.text: It's an "eh" from me. Bought it purely for the mic and yet all my friends complain I'm now too quiet unless I pretty much eat my mic (but who know's, maybe I'm just quiet?). Sound quality is okay, but it's such a pain to setup the crazy marketed "super 4x audio codec" given it bricked Discord so I gave up. Do they play game audio and have a mic, yes. Are they worth the £50> price I paid for them.. not really.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Banger of a headset
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset, the volume control is amazing and makes listening to your raid leader yelling at you very easy. Can easily toggle the volume up and down until you've got your rage levels and music balance juuuuuuuust right. Overall I would recommend this headset to anyone who needs and upgrade, also if you suffer from horrific eyesight, like myself, the padding in the headset comes with a small area where your glasses would theoretically sit. This is appreciated and makes the yelling so much sweeter to my ears. The extra THX (DUUUUUUUUUN) box is a welcome addition to my already overflowing Razer Synapse app. 10/10 would buy for my whole guild
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: So, you want a gaming headset? Then why don't you try this one! The sound quality is awesome, I had 5 hours long gaming session with friends and my ears have not fallen off - and I can use those both on my PC and Xbox! My friends say that I sounded okay, so the quality of the microphone is nice as well. And well, you could get a more expensive one, but come on - this will do!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade to a cheap gaming headset that was on a deal I don’t regret it. Great little piece of kit and the sound is very good. Just tried it with Dolby atmos on Xbox One and it sounds amazing. Would recommend for anyone thinking about getting this. Also comes with a code for Pc to enable 7.1 surround sound. But seeing how I’m on Xbox it’s irrelevant for me. 5 stars :)
customer_reviews.author: Metal-ed

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, really comfortable and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of problems at the beginning but it ended up working out, I recommend using synapse for the spatial sounding for it to work well, they’re super comfortable and super pretty, The sound quality is amazing and great for FPS games such as call of duty, pubg and others as you can here exactly where gunshots are coming from, also great for streaming as they can have stream reactive lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Load of rubbish
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly the worst headphones in the world for low end (footsteps in call of duty/BF) even with synapse THX 7.1 enabled they're easily the worst-performing headphones I've ever used.... don't waste your money, get some high-end turtle beach or Astro A40's/50's if you can afford them. They're alright for listening to music, however, I've noticed the left-hand speaker driver is rattling a bit, which isn't great seeing as I've only owned them for about 2 months. (Review from someone who's played COD religiously since 2007) Please don't be fooled by the good reviews, if you're serious about gaming DO NOT buy these. S.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headset for the price, if you are looking for a headset that has amazing quality audio, this is not the headset for you, this headset is for general gaming and general listening experience, it will not blow you away with the sound quality it's just a nice overall headset that has all aspects covered.
customer_reviews.author: ΛDΛM

customer_reviews.title: Very good gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: This is a hugely comfortable gaming headset. My son loves it and was a upgrade from Turtle Beach Recon 70. They surround is awesome and a big advantage for FPS. The build quality is excellent and the THX is perfect. He did say the mic sounds a bit robotic to his friends when talking, but we are played with the settings to resolve this. Now very happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: the headset is good for gaming i would give it a miss if you like music,I have to update this review once you use these headphones for a while they become fantastic, you really have to wear them in before they sound as good as they do do right now for me I would advise you to buy this headset for pretty much any setup they are absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Colquhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great Noise Cancellation
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and feel solidly made. Maybe a bit on the bulky side both in feel and design. I can vouch for their noise cancellation properties because my son hears nothing I say since he got them! He says the sound quality is very good and more directional than other high quality headphones he's tried. Very good for gamers but should be at the price.
customer_reviews.author: sibl23

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 surround sound
customer_reviews.text: After a fair bit of research I purchased these (tournament edition) for my PS4. Main reason for the review is to help anyone looking to buy these purely on a surround sound basis - not as a headset. I've got to say the 5.1 surround sound is incredible, sound has a lot of depth. Having previously been used to a full 5.1 set up these offer a great alternative. You can use the USB, this isn't always clear but the ps4 recognises it straight away and it works, alternatively you can plug the 3.5mm jack directly into the controller but I've found the usb controller easier to use as it has more control options. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Finally settled on buying these after looking at and I can’t say I was disappointed with the product. The product doesn’t feature noise cancellation in either the microphone or the headset itself but no noise comes through the headset or the microphone. The overall structure of the headset is great, the aluminium is a much better material then previous headsets which were made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, very comfortable and fits over ears so no pain from pressure against the cartilage of the ear, mic works well and is clear for other hearing you, the sound is great on warzone/call of duty for example, hearing footsteps ect it clear and gives an accurate representation as to where they are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuyWhoLikesPurple

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I've owned yet.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant audio quality. If you like music with a lot of bass, you'll love them. Haven't tested the mic yet, but if the build quality and audio quality are anything to go by, it'll be great. Extremely comfortable, although they feel heavy when holding them, they're easily the most comfortable headphones I've worn. It has a braided cable too, so it's fairly durable and it comes with a microphone/audio splitter too, instead of having to buy one separate. I managed to get it for about £48 as opposed to the usual £80 but I'd gladly pay the £80 given the quality.
customer_reviews.author: William Y.

customer_reviews.title: My honest overview
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very good headset with good sound and a high quality mic. What drags this down is the usb dongle. It says it should work with ps4 but it only works for 10 seconds for not responding. The ‘cooling gel’ last for about 10 mins. It doesn’t get really hot but it can definitely be a discomfort to some. It disappoints me the headset is dragged down by the fact it says it should work on ps4 but it doesn’t. Even when the dongle works for 10 seconds the THX feature doesn’t work and is one of the main reasons why I bought this. If they fix the dongle issue then this would be one of the best headsets
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Ears what I think.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. Not the quality I expected from Razer. They're okay I guess, but not good value would be my takeaway. One particular point of frustration is the volume control. It's of a type, that due to it's location on the lead often results in it rubbing against clothing and intermittently adjusting the level. Very annoying. Of course, this may nor happen to everyone. The sound quality is, I would say, average at best. Not tinny, not bassy, but not hi fi either. The 'cooling gel ' ear pieces are not much more than a gimmick, though they aren't uncomfortable even for longer plays. Overall not bad, just not worth the coin imho.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but no 7.1 surround sound on pc
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation is near non existent with all headsets, but this one does it best. Sound quality is crisp and amazing, but I am giving it a 3 star review because the 7.1 surround sound doesn't work for pc. It will only enable if.i selection 7.1 in sound settings, but it isn't there, so yeah. Works on xbox though.
customer_reviews.author: Angry customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for voice and for meetings, but create eczema around my ears
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work meetings, good for voice both hearing and speaking, as I have etter wireless sonys for gaming and music. Seem to be very good and nice to have the physical mute function. Comfy but can get hot, despite the gel. Not good for people with sensitive skin, they cause eczema around my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the non-retractable mic headset
customer_reviews.text: The retractable microphone can be a bit twitchy as to whether it chooses to transmit audio and will crackle on occasion. This is fixable by pulling gently on the microphone to ensure it's extended fully and gently wiggling to encourage the connection. If I bought another it would be the non retractable type to avoid this issue, otherwise sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Worst headset I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: As a whole it's a decent headset, however the issues for me is the god awful microphone. Nothing to do with the quality of voice but I tried two of these headsets and both of them had this following issue. Whenever the mic was being activated by an app (discord, games, etc.) It would produce a horrible high pitch sound that wouldn't stop in the left ear. I have owned the previous Kraken's in the past and it was much better than this disappointment. Sticking a green led on it doesn't make it good. I refunded this and went with the Razer Blackshark V2, now that's a headset that razer can call a headset
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute Kitty Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my birthday and the quality is on point! I can hear all the sounds and my friends seem to say that the mic sounds clear and enhanced. It’s a bit pricey but it’s totally worth it if your a proper gamer that plays all the time! Totally recommend great buy 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: danielle smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Absolute Joke - 8 Days In And The Plastic On The Headset Broke - Made A Temp Fix With Tape Until I Could Return It And The Next Day Plastic Snapped Again. On The Marking Of The Enlargement Point
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awful sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, and it is one of the worst sounding headsets I have ever heard. There is bass on everything, it overpowers and muffles everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: So they are definitely Pro’s and Con’s to these headphones, depending on how you want to use them! For me I am a casual gamer and they have really enhanced my gaming experience, I did not mind downloading additional software and the sound quality is really good and you can choose how much you want to hear other players compared to the game sounds, overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great headset , worth the money
customer_reviews.text: At first I was dissatisfied at the lack of LED's but quickly came to love this headset instead and realised what is the point of LED's on a headset when you can't even see it! It feels really comfy on, the sound quality is great and the surround sound in games like csgo is amazing for hearing where other players are. (My previous headset was one of the older Razer kraken 7.1 chromas and I'm really happy with the upgrade)
customer_reviews.author: dani c.

customer_reviews.title: Never had Razer headphones before but these are truly amazing
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ever used the Razer headphones always used Turtle Beach in the past but these were recommended to me by a friend and wow they are truly amazing. Finding the right headphones that don't start hurting your ears after about an hour has always been the holy grail but these have past that test with flying colours, the sound quality is amazing and being able to put the mic away with ease when your playing solo is also a great feature. Overall these get a 10 out of 10 from me and would recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out other sound in the room you only hear the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love them to death. Best headset i have ever had. It worked right out of the box. Only one downside. The download for the software was very long. But If looking to gaming and not hear other ppl in the room and keep your ears nice and cool then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: very good, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones and i beleive you get what you pay for, although the sound quality could still be better, hence the 4 stars, they definitely do the job for how much they cost. They aren't Dolby Atmos out of the box but i reckon THX is still pretty decent. Whats also quite cool is the little controller for the THX activation can be stuck to a surface for convenience. I like that as i hate clipping controllers to me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays Cool!
customer_reviews.text: To start off, let me just say this headset is fantastic. Good bass, good sound quality and very comfortable. The ear cushions stay very cool throughout long periods of use. The headset itself is made out of high quality materials. Having used multiple other brands of headsets such as logitech, corsair and turtle beach, I can easily say the Razer Kraken tournament edition headset is by far the most comfortable and high quality while still being in a similar price range to previous headsets I've owned. Very good purchase. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Good size. Clean sound. Room for improvements
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good headphone. Definitely not in the professional side of things but it does what it says. Found it especially goon on shooters as there's good accuracy on the sound direction.the size is spot on covering the ears completely. When maxxed out on an audio interdace tho you start getting some buzz artefacts here and there, so there's some room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Aikaterini Georgiadi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had turtle beach XO1's that are sadly no longer available to buy, they have done me very well but unfortunately the ear piece has broken so it was time to upgrade. i bought these after someone recommended them highly and i am not disappointed! they're great, the 7.1 surround sound is awesome on Xbox one, you know whom is where in game, makes for a really good experience, good price for the quality, noise cancellation is decent for the money paid to be honest, hope they stand the test of time now! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Master Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are excellent for both gaming and even listening to audio on mobile devices. I use them for my PS4 and they give such a great surround feel. I'm hearing and picking up things my friends i'm playing with cannot hear. They are comfortable, fit over my entire ear (not causing any rub, itch or eventual sweat) and are light weight (even for the size - they are big). Excellent product for such a fairly reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Terrible... do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good and so is everything else, just the mic and surround sound had problems. I was very limited with the surround sound in the way of how it’s setup. The mic was terrible, it ecos people voices through my mic because the mic is too close to the headphones and even if you put your volume down, it ecos. I doubt this was tested properly. I would not trust this company for headsets. Go for Corsair or another company. Razer is good for keyboards only.
customer_reviews.author: Artin

customer_reviews.title: Gamer to gamer, think twice about this headset. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the 7th of March 2020. I look after my gaming gear but the poor design of this headset just hasn't held up, honestly I've had Turtle Beaches that have held up better. Faulty wiring and usb failing. Disconnects and reconnects uncontrollably, even though everything is updated. And the usb is plugged in correctly. It lags out my games. The only good thing about the headset is the LED, not worth the money for fancy lights and brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Theglossyshewolf

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for day to day use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after friends review not by any means a serious gamer but the ability to play without annoying rest of the household was a bonus. Quality is solid these are quite a big unit and took while to get used to vs older lightweight headset but sound quality is superb decent bass and great microphone clarity.
customer_reviews.author: eric prigg

customer_reviews.title: A good Headset but build quality could be better ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the headphones are good ... The sound quality and sound immersion is very good ... my only concern is the build quality ... I had mine about six weeks and noticed the left side was sitting awkward on ear ... i checked them out and found the flexible head arm was wearing and starting to crack ... my solution to this was to lower the headband to cover this and protect it from bending to much ... If you do buy this and they are a good headset do not extend the arms all the way down as to much bending will weaken the arms and possibly break them over time ...
customer_reviews.author: Roy B.

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy and cool but seriously sub par sound
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, they are probably the most comfortable headset I've ever tried, the cooling gel isn't just a gimmick it really works! BUT the sound quality is really bellow average! There is virtually no bass response and in game audio sounds so tinny and cheap, the headphones you get on a flight sound better! I was truly disappointed as I have used Razer products in the past and they were good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Razer Kraken Ultimate – USB Gaming Headset (Gaming Headphones for PC, PS4 and Switch Dock with Surround Sound, ANC Microphone and RGB Chroma)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Kraken Ultimate| Colour Name:Black (RGB Chroma)Hear the unfair advantage first-hand and be the last man standing with the Razer Kraken Ultimate. Armed with THX Spatial Audio, a highly tuned noise-cancelling mic, and long-lasting comfort to provide the ultimate competitive gaming audio experience.
feature_bullets: THX Spatial Audio: Gain a competitive advantage-track your opponents with pinpoint accuracy and awareness using distinct and precise positional audio that lets you locate opponents even before they’re within sight

Active Noise-Canceling Microphone: Ensure absolute clarity when relaying information to your squad, with a highly-tuned microphone that effectively cuts out background noises like your fan, aircon, and rig

Aluminium and Steel Construction: A bauxite aluminum frame and stainless steel headband make the headset light, flexible, and incredibly durable-built to withstand intense gaming sessions for years to come

Custom-Tuned 50 mm Drivers: The Razer Kraken ultimate’s superior sound clarity and deep, punchy bass make for a rich soundscape that ideally captures every footstep and gunshot for a competitive advantage

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
